newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine trade says Poland seeking 30,000 T wheat.
newsitem.headline: Argentine trade says Poland seeking 30,000 T wheat.

text.p: Poland is seeking 30,000 tonnes of wheat for December to March shipment, Argentine traders said.
Asked whether Poland could buy Argentine wheat, one trader responded: "Could well be, Argentine wheat is the cheapest in the world at the moment."

With its farmers heading for a bumper wheat crop of around 14 million tonnes or more, Argentine wheat exports are set to double from 1996/97 to 8-9 million tonnes and Argentine exporters are pushing into new markets.
